h4.a: NO SCHOOL For the rest of the 2019-2020 year. Stay safe.

Big G Receipts.......you may drop off on Carol front step in bag, mail to Carol at 524 Harrison St Victor or mail to school at 402 5th St. Deadline for turn in has been extended so you May drop off up to April 24 but the sooner the better.
FOOD BANK CHANGE- Starting March 26 the food bank will be open every Thursday until further notice. The hours will now be 4:00-7:00. ONLY 1 person per family will be allowed in the food bank!

img.alt: Teaching our Youth of Today to be Leaders of Tomorrow

div.h2: Teaching our Youth of Today to be Leaders of Tomorrow

font.span: Big G Receipts due to Carol or mailed to school

div.font: Welcome to HLV Community School District
div.br: HLV offers small, engaging classes and hands-on learning experiences in a challenging and supportive environment. Our dedicated teachers inspire students to ask sharp questions, think deeply, try new things, and spark lifelong passions. Teachers are dedicated not just to their academic subject, but to mentoring and guiding students to reach their highest potential. Students learn with the future in mind. In classes, students practice and strengthen key skills - creativity, critical thinking, communication, teamwork, problem solving, innovation, global perspectives, and creating and applying ethical frameworks.
